safetyTips: Non contact Collection. Text when arrived. Order placed directly in boot of car.
name: KENT COOKERY SCHOOL
address: The Courtyard, Hythe Road, Mersham, Ashford TN25 6NH
description: Kent Cookery School is now offering a new service, Kent Cookery @ Home, which is a Collection Service for fresh and local produce. Non contact Collection - your order is placed directly in your car. Download the order form online and email to order. Collection is usually between 1.30-3.30pm Wednesdays & 11.30-1.30pm Saturdays. *Live weekly tutorial videos, with James can also be found on our website.
